participant_1.background:
My sister-in-law said I was a lazy bum because I never had to work, but she doesn't know that I spend my days running my family business.
The weather is not usually a factor when I am outside looking for wildlife.
I'm just trying to live my life and be myself, and I enjoy country music, tattoos, and iced tea.
I'm single and enjoy my freedom to drive around with the wind in my hair.
i love my impala.

participant_2.background:
I have a mobile hanging above my baby's crib.
I like to have a place where I can fully immerse myself in my fantasy world.
I am proud of the creative projects I have made in my studio.
My favorite place to eat is the local diner, where the staff knows my name and the food is delicious.
I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books.

content.text: Not much. Just reading my mermaid books and drinking hot chocolate.
That sounds relaxing. I'm just driving around with the wind in my hair.
Sounds fun! Where are you headed?
Nowhere in particular. Just enjoying the freedom.
I love that feeling! I feel the same way when I'm in my studio creating.
What kind of creative projects do you make?
I make jewelry, paintings, and sculptures.
That's awesome! I'd love to see them sometime.
Sure, I'd love to show you.
